channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: President-Elect Lai Taps Former DPP Chair for Next Premier
item.description: Taiwan President-elect Lai Ching-te says he's appointing former DPP Chair Cho Jung-tai to head up the next Cabinet after he takes office in May.

item.title: Service Dogs Aid Earthquake Search and Rescue Efforts
item.description: Search and rescue efforts are still underway after the massive earthquake in Hualien on April 3rd. Emergency workers are being aided by service dogs proving essential in the search

item.title: How Taiwan's New Premier Will Impact Politics
item.description: TaiwanPlus speaks to political analyst Courtney Donovan Smith to find out how Taiwan's new premier might affect the country's political landscape.

item.title: Taiwan's Former President Ma Ying-jeou Meets Xi Jinping in Beijing
item.description: Taiwan's former President Ma Ying-jeou has met with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing, the second meeting between the two men following a summit in Singapore in 2015, when Ma
